scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd backend && npm ci && cd ../frontend && npm ci && cd ../infrastructure/cdk && npm ci
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd infrastructure/cdk && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:fresh: npm run install:all && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk synth
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run build && cd infrastructure/cdk && npx cdk diff
